attributes.description: Stacked bar: average duration per phase across all requests
attributes.title: Average Duration by Phase
attributes.visState: {"title": "Average Duration by Phase", "type": "horizontal_bar", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "duration_ms", "customLabel": "Avg Duration (ms)"}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "phase", "size": 20, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "1", "customLabel": "Phase"}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "type": "horizontal_bar", "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "left"}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "bottom", "title": {"text": "ms"}}]}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Time series: total request duration (ms) over time
attributes.title: Total Request Duration Over Time
attributes.visState: {"title": "Total Request Duration Over Time", "type": "line", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "total_duration_ms", "customLabel": "Avg Total (ms)"}}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "max", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "total_duration_ms", "customLabel": "Max Total (ms)"}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "@timestamp", "interval": "auto", "min_doc_count": 1}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right"}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Stacked bar per trace showing phase durations (waterfall approximation)
attributes.title: Phase Waterfall by Trace
attributes.visState: {"title": "Phase Waterfall by Trace", "type": "horizontal_bar", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "sum", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "duration_ms", "customLabel": "Duration (ms)"}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "trace_id", "size": 15, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "_key", "customLabel": "Trace ID"}}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "group", "params": {"field": "phase", "size": 20, "order": "asc", "orderBy": "_key", "customLabel": "Phase"}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "type": "horizontal_bar", "mode": "stacked", "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "left"}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "bottom", "title": {"text": "ms"}}]}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Percentage of total time spent in each phase (pie chart)
attributes.title: Time Distribution by Phase
attributes.visState: {"title": "Time Distribution by Phase", "type": "pie", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "sum", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "duration_ms", "customLabel": "Total Duration (ms)"}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "phase", "size": 20, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "1", "customLabel": "Phase"}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "isDonut": true, "type": "pie"}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Completed request count in time range
attributes.title: Request Count
attributes.visState: {"title": "Request Count", "type": "metric", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {"customLabel": "Requests"}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "metric": {"percentageMode": false, "useRanges": false, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "invertColors": false, "labels": {"show": true}, "style": {"bgFill": "#000", "bgColor": false, "labelColor": false, "subText": ""}}}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.title: Avg Request Duration
attributes.visState: {"title": "Avg Request Duration", "type": "metric", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "total_duration_ms", "customLabel": "Avg ms"}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "metric": {"percentageMode": false, "useRanges": false, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "invertColors": false, "labels": {"show": true}, "style": {"bgFill": "#000", "bgColor": false, "labelColor": false, "subText": ""}}}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Trace-level detail table with total duration and session
attributes.title: Request Timing Detail Table
attributes.visState: {"title": "Request Timing Detail Table", "type": "table", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {"customLabel": "Phases"}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "bucket", "params": {"field": "trace_id", "size": 50, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "3", "customLabel": "Trace ID"}}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "max", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "total_duration_ms", "customLabel": "Total (ms)"}, "parentId": "2"}, {"id": "4", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "bucket", "params": {"field": "session_id", "size": 5, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "1", "customLabel": "Session"}, "parentId": "2"}], "params": {"perPage": 20, "showPartialRows": false, "showMetricsAtAllLevels": false, "showTotal": false}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Slowest phases: top phases by avg duration
attributes.title: Slowest Phases (Top 10)
attributes.visState: {"title": "Slowest Phases (Top 10)", "type": "table", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {"customLabel": "Occurrences"}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "schema": "bucket", "params": {"field": "phase", "size": 10, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "3", "customLabel": "Phase"}}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "duration_ms", "customLabel": "Avg (ms)"}, "parentId": "2"}, {"id": "4", "enabled": true, "type": "max", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "duration_ms", "customLabel": "Max (ms)"}, "parentId": "2"}, {"id": "5", "enabled": true, "type": "percentiles", "schema": "metric", "params": {"field": "duration_ms", "percents": [95], "customLabel": "P95 (ms)"}, "parentId": "2"}], "params": {"perPage": 10, "showPartialRows": false, "showMetricsAtAllLevels": false, "showTotal": false}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: End-to-end request timing: phase breakdown, waterfall, time distribution, slowest phases, and request detail.
attributes.title: Request Timing (E2E)
